location.zh-cn: 云南省昆明市西山区滇池路219号

description.zh-cn: 云南省人民政府的组成部门，主管云南省司法行政工作的省级司法行政机关。
description.en: A constituent department of the Yunnan Provincial People's Government, it is the provincial-level judicial administrative organ in charge of judicial administration in Yunnan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任云南省司法厅党委书记、厅长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Party Secretary and Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 云南省司法厅直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任云南省司法厅政治部主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Director of the Political Department of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国司法部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国司法部
en: Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管全国司法行政工作。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national judicial administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党云南省委员会政法委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党云南省委员会政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党云南省委员会领导和管理政法工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Yunnan Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party that leads and manages political and legal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest trial organ in Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 云南省司法厅直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 云南省司法厅直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

nodes.id: 云南省政府法制研究中心

zh-cn: 云南省政府法制研究中心

description.zh-cn: 云南省司法厅直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 刘宗根担任云南省司法厅党委书记、厅长。
description.en: Liu Zonggen serves as the Party Secretary and Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 刘宗根兼任云南省监狱管理局第一政委。
description.en: Liu Zonggen concurrently serves as the First Political Commissar of the Yunnan Provincial Prison Administration Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 胡江天担任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: Hu Jiangtian serves as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 高兵担任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: Gao Bing serves as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 王军担任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: Wang Jun serves as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 彭国军担任云南省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: Peng Guojun serves as the Deputy Director of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 柴万宏担任云南省司法厅政治部主任。
description.en: Chai Wanhong serves as the Director of the Political Department of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国司法部

description.zh-cn: 云南省司法厅是中华人民共和国司法部的业务上级机构。
description.en: The Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice is operationally subordinate to the Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 云南省司法厅是云南省人民政府的组成部门。
description.en: The Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice is a constituent department of the Yunnan Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党云南省委员会政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 云南省司法厅接受中国共产党云南省委员会政法委员会的领导。
description.en: The Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice is under the leadership of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Yunnan Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1957年6月至1959年7月期间，云南省司法厅与云南省高级人民法院合署办公。
description.en: From June 1957 to July 1959, the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice and the Yunnan Provincial Higher People's Court operated from a joint office.

description.zh-cn: 云南省监狱管理局是云南省司法厅的直属事业单位。
description.en: The Yunnan Provincial Prison Administration Bureau is a public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 云南省戒毒管理局是云南省司法厅的直属事业单位。
description.en: The Yunnan Provincial Administration of Drug Rehabilitation is a public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 云南省政法干部学校是云南省司法厅的直属事业单位。
description.en: The Yunnan Political and Legal Cadre School is a public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.

relationships.source: 云南省政府法制研究中心

description.zh-cn: 云南省政府法制研究中心是云南省司法厅的直属事业单位。
description.en: The Yunnan Provincial Government Legal System Research Center is a public institution directly under the Yunnan Provincial Department of Justice.
